Name: Pepper & Vanilla
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of yellow pepper strip.
Review: Vanilla and pepper seem to complement each other in a sweet and sour kind of way.
History: Created in 2002 by yours truly and originally somewhat dodgily named Pepper & Vanilla'tini. Incidentally, Pieprz i wanilia (which translates as Pepper and Vanilla) was a popular Polish television programme broadcast by TVP. This travel documentary series was broadcast for over 20 years with 300 episodes.
Nutrition: One serving of Pepper & Vanilla contains 222 calories
